text: The Burundi national under-23 football team represents Burundi in association football at an under-23 age level and is controlled by the Football Federation of Burundi, the governing body for football in Burundi. ==Players== The following 26 players were named for the match against Congo on 26 March 2019. ==Tournament history== ===Africa U-23 Cup of Nations=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA !GD |- | 2011||Did not qualify||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |- | 2015||Did not qualify||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |- | 2019||Did not qualify||-||-||-||-||-||-||- |} ==Results and fixtures== ===2018=== ===2019=== ==References== Category:Burundi national football team Category:African national under-23 association football teams
title: Burundi national under-23 football team
